Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurs out of all activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR across all process instances
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities

Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' occurs

Name: Percentage of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR occurrences that lead to a rejection (e.g., followed by Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR compared to the frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION' occurs

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Number of process instances containing Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that eventually result in Payment Handled
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Payment Handled' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants with Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR that do not contain any rejection activity (e.g., Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR, Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR relative to the total number of approval-related activities (including Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER and Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by ADMINISTRATION)
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Number of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR events occurring in variants that also contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER
Metric: Number of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR appears but Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER never occurred earlier in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR in successful end-to-end variants (ending in Payment Handled) versus unsuccessful variants (ending in any rejection)

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration FOR_APPROVAL by SUPERVISOR' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER' does not happen
